QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_integrationmappings.id odf_pk, int_integrationmappings.code as code, int_integrationmappings.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_integrationmappings.internal_url as internal_url, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_integrationmappings.staging_object_code as staging_object_code, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, int_integrationmappings.staging_object_alias as staging_object_alias, (select l.name from cmn_lookups_v l where lookup_type='NMC_INTEGRATION_VENDOR' and language_code=user_context.language_code and lookup_code = (select integration_vendor_code from nmc_integrations where code = INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS.integration)) as vendor, int_integrationmappings.NAME as name, int_integrationmappings.integration as integration, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_integration_mappings.partition_code as partition_code, INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id , srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_integration_mappings odf_ca_integration_mappings where 1 = 1 and int_integrationmappings.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_integrationmappings.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_integrationmappings.id = odf_ca_integration_mappings.id
